Articles.Content: Been hovering around the forums for the while, but just recently decided to register an account. So hello!
Welcome, what have you been doing in ksp so far?

Prior to 0.22, I spent most of my time building a space station in orbit. Colonel_Panic's OASIS series was the foundation and I made a few modifications to cut down on the part count. Very rewarding experience, seeing it up in orbit. My poor computer, though...

Post 0.22, I've been working on my first interplanetary mission. Have the lifter for it, but I don't seem to have the patience to wait for the launch window xD
